text: Laurent Dona Fologo (12 December 1939 – 5 February 2021) was an Ivorian politician. From 2000 until 2011, he was President of the . He was a member of the Democratic Party. Fologo was born in Sinématiali, French West Africa. Fologo died on 5 February 2021 in Abidjan, Ivory Coast at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ivorian politicians
title: Laurent Dona Fologo
